description:
Konju and Mikochi enjoy each other’s company while baking and crafting. Later, a usual trip to the mountains take a dangerous turn for the worst.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Jour de travail - 2 / Hibou et souvenirs
Shigoto no Hi 2 to Mimizuku to Mukashibanashi
Work Day 2 / Horned Owls and Old Tales
仕事の日2 と ミミズクと昔話
